entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h late in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 17 April 2023
